OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params._agent: Address of the agent to add - pet vets

addMember(uint256,address).details: Adds a member to a community

params._member: Address of the member to add

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with the deployer as owner

getAgents().details: Returns a list of all agents

isAgent(address).details: Checks if an address is an agent

isRegisteredEntity(address).details: Checks if an address is a registered entity

isRegisteredUser(address).details: Checks if an address is a registered user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._entity: Address of the entity to register

params._user: Address of the user to register

params._agent: Address of the agent to remove

params._entity: Address of the entity to remove

params._user: Address of the user to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
